item.title: Sayin ur the owner
item.dc:creator: @sickedank sickedank
item.description:
@sickedank wrote:

search for

+playerName+ " has logged in";
or
playerName+ " has logged in";

in client.java.
under those, add this.

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yourname")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner, "+playerName+" Has logged in"; }

Remember to replace “yourname” with your username…

Read full topic
